Uses of Package
org.apache.ignite.spi.failover

  • Packages that use org.apache.ignite.spi.failover 
    Package Description
    org.apache.ignite.configuration
    Contains configuration-related classes.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.failover
    Contains APIs for failover SPI.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.failover.always
    Contains default "always" failover SPI.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.failover.jobstealing
    Contains job stealing failover SPI.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.failover.never
    Contains "never" failover SPI.
  • Classes in org.apache.ignite.spi.failover used by org.apache.ignite.configuration 
    Class and Description
    FailoverSpi
    Failover SPI provides developer with ability to supply custom logic for handling failed execution of a grid job.
  • Classes in org.apache.ignite.spi.failover used by org.apache.ignite.spi.failover 
    Class and Description
    FailoverContext
    This interface defines a set of operations available to failover SPI one a given failed job.
  • Classes in org.apache.ignite.spi.failover used by org.apache.ignite.spi.failover.always 
    Class and Description
    FailoverContext
    This interface defines a set of operations available to failover SPI one a given failed job.
    FailoverSpi
    Failover SPI provides developer with ability to supply custom logic for handling failed execution of a grid job.
  • Classes in org.apache.ignite.spi.failover used by org.apache.ignite.spi.failover.jobstealing 
    Class and Description

    This interface defines a set of operations available to failover SPI one a given failed job.
